title: WTT/WTB Rare T206 and other WaJos
author: MuncieNolePAZ

posts.post_title: WTT/WTB Rare T206 and other WaJos
posts.post_content:
Hey everyone,

I am looking to trade for some rare T206s WaJos along with some other WaJos. I know that some of these are extremely unlikely, but you never know.

T206 Portrait--Hindu Brown, Old Mill
T206 Hands at Chest--BroadLeaf 460, Cycle 460, Drum, Hindu Red, Lenox Black, Piedmont 460/42

T213-3 OP, T214 Victory, T215 Red Cross 1 and 2; T215 Pirate
T205 Hindu, T207 Napoleon
T5 and T222
1908/09 Rose Company Postcard and 1910 Novelty Cutlery Postcard
1914 Texas Tommy 1 and 2

Here are the cards that I have for potential trade (not looking to sell)

1914 CJ Ty Cobb SGC Auth, 1933 Goudey #53 Babe Ruth PSA 1 
1951 Bowman Mickey Mantle PSA 1.5 1951 Bowman Willie Mays SGC 1.5
1952 Topps Willie Mays PSA 1.5 1954 Topps Hank Aaron BVG 2.5
T206s Ty Cobbs:
Green Portrait-Pied 150  PSA Auth, SC 150/25 PSA Auth
Red Portrait- OM Auth Altered, Pied 350, Polar Bear SGC 2, Sovereign 350 PSA Auth, SC 350/25 SGC Auth, SC 350/30 SGC Auth, Tolstoi SGC 1

Please PM if you have any of the cards that I am interested in. I can email you photos of my cards.

Thanks
Chad
Chad, good luck. That’s some strong trade bait right there!

Thanks Mike. Somehow I missed your comment.

Chad
